instanceVariables.name: ActTime
instanceVariables.desc: Number of turns spent preparing for action, -1 randomizes

instanceVariables.name: Ready
instanceVariables.desc: Is the trap done with the turn's actions

instanceVariables.name: ActMax
instanceVariables.desc: Used as ActTime randomization cap, between 0 and this

instanceVariables.name: trapID
instanceVariables.desc: Used to identify specific traps, mainly for projectile pairing
